doc.field: Print matter: Thick folders of reading material & student papers re: "bunker gear"/personal protective equipment (PPE)/"Morning Pride" product from courses taught by Spadafora. Folder of material re: Spadafora's article in WNYF re: powdered aerosol suppressant, with floppy and CD-R of photos (with related 2009 WNYF issue). Folders of reference materials on water mist systems, including CDs. Folder of print matter/tearsheets re: wildland firefighting, and binder of training material "Rural Firefighting Handbook." Folder re: thermal imaging camera. Folder and textbook re: smoke control systems. Text re: benefit of behavioral research to fire service. (Includes digital formats)
